sentences.sentence: Even today, god parents will often give shoes to their godchild on this occasion.
sentences.translation: 即使是今天，教父教母给教子的礼物仍常常是鞋。

sentences.sentence: One of these is Lyralei, master archer of the wood, and favored godchild of the wind.
sentences.translation: 其中之一就是受到风神眷顾的森林弓箭大师莱瑞蕾。

sentences.sentence: Women don't have a push-and-go as strong as men, most of who prefer a life to assist and godchild.
sentences.translation: 女人的事业心没有男人这么重，大多数还是想相夫教子的过日子。
